summary: A computer network connects multiple computers, allowing them to share resources and communicate. These networks use digital connections, like wires, optics, or wireless signals, to link devices. Each device, called a node, has a unique address for identification. Networks can be categorized by their size, connection methods, and purpose. They enable various activities, including web browsing, sharing files, and using email. Personal computers, servers, and specialized hardware are all part of these networks, making it easier to access and share information.
title: Computer network
